00024 // dll impexp macros. Thanks to Mike Sazonov
00025 #ifdef WXMAKINGDLL_FREECHART
00026 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART WXEXPORT
00027 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_FREECHART(type) WXEXPORT type
00028 #elif defined(WXUSINGDLL) && !defined(_LOCAL_)
00029 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART WXIMPORT
00030 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_FREECHART(type) WXIMPORT type
00031 #else // not making nor using DLL
00032 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_FREECHART
00033 #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_FREECHART(type) type
00034 #endif

00036 #define ABS(a) ((a) < 0) ? (-1*(a)) : (a)
00037 
00038 
00039 #define wxREPLACE(dst, src) do {                                        \
00040         wxDELETE(dst);                                                                  \
00041         dst = src;                                                                              \
00042 } while (0)
00043 
00044 inline static double *NewZeroDoubleArray(int size)
00045 {
00046         double *array = new double[size];
00047 
00048         for (int n = 0; n < size; n++) {
00049                 array[n] = 0;
00050         }
00051         return array;
00052 }
00053 
00054 inline static int RoundHigh(double value)
00055 {
00056         int iv = (int) value;
00057 
00058         if (((double) iv) > value)
00059                 iv++;
00060         return iv;
00061 }
00062 
00063 static inline int maxV(int count, int first, ...)
00064 {
00065         int maxValue = first;
00066         int n;
00067         va_list args;
00068 
00069         va_start(args, first);
00070 
00071         for (n = 1; n < count; n++) {
00072                 int value = va_arg(args, int);
00073                 maxValue = wxMax(maxValue, value);
00074         }
00075         va_end(args);
00076         return maxValue;
00077 }
